hero.title: Fast wheels
hero.subcription: Cars are ready for the cold - enemies have no chance at all!
hero.for: For the 59th Brigade named after Yakiv Handziuk for the purchase of car details

progressBar.Preparing: Preparing together for our victorious winter

about.title: About brigade
about.text-1: The 59th Separate Motorized Infantry Brigade named after Yakiv Handziuk was formed after the beginning of Russian aggression, at the end of 2014. It consisted of three battalions: 9th, 10th and 11th battalions. The brigade is named in honor of Yakiv Handziuk, a Ukrainian military leader during the First Liberation Movement.
about.text-2: We are raising funds to purchase the necessary auto details. It is very important to prepare military vehicles for the winter now, so that nothing prevents our defenders from performing their military tasks at the front line and bringing our victory closer.

important.title: Why it is important
important.text-1: With high-quality car details, our defenders become invincible.
important.text-2: They can quickly and efficiently reach any military location.
important.text-3: The most important, it will save the lives of our defenders and protectresses.

strength.title: The strength is in unity!
strength.sharing: Help others learn about our  fundraising
